transportAdvice: The Hotel Zone is a long narrow strip where walking between resorts and beaches is common, though distances can be large; an affordable local bus runs the length of the Hotel Zone and connects to downtown. Taxis are widely available throughout the city, and it is advisable to agree on a fare before departing.

weather.description: Warm and mostly sunny with comfortable temperatures and little rain, making it one of the best months to visit.
Dry and pleasant with clear skies and mild evenings, ideal for beach and outdoor activities.
Temperatures begin to rise and conditions remain dry and sunny, attracting spring break crowds.
Hot and largely dry with excellent beach weather and calm seas.
Heat and humidity increase noticeably and afternoon showers begin to appear more frequently.
The rainy season is underway with frequent afternoon thunderstorms and the start of hurricane season.
Hot and humid with regular heavy showers, though mornings are often sunny and beaches remain busy.
Peak hurricane season brings the highest risk of tropical storms along with persistent heat and humidity.
The wettest and most storm-prone month of the year; travel insurance and flexible plans are advisable.
Rain begins to ease toward the end of the month as hurricane season winds down, though humidity remains high.
Conditions improve significantly with lower humidity and comfortable temperatures returning.
Dry and warm with pleasant evenings, making it a popular month for holiday travel and festive events.
